name: Peng Zhao 0006
content: Peng Zhao @ LAMDA, NJU AI Peng Zhao Home Publication Teaching Talk Service and Award Peng Zhao @ LAMDA, NJU AI Assistant Professor, LAMDA Group School of Artificial IntelligenceNational Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology Nanjing University, Nanjing 210023, China Office: Room 1017, Computer Science Building Email: zhaop [at] lamda.nju.edu.cn About Me I am an assistant professor in School of Artificial Intelligence at Nanjing University, and I am also a member of LAMDA Group. I obtained my PhD from Department of Computer Science and Technology in Nanjing University in 2021, where I was very fortunate to be advised by Prof. Zhi-Hua Zhou. During my PhD, I had the privilege of visiting Prof. Haipeng Luo (USC) and Prof. Yu-Xiang Wang (UCSD). For prospective students [2026å¹´å ¥å­¦ç¡å£«/åå£«] Teaching (Advanced Optimization, Fall 2025; Intro to ML, Spring 2025) Research Interests My research interests include topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence, especially on their theoretical foundations. Most recently, I am interested in Online Learning, bandits, online games Optimization (LLM optimization, stochastic optimization, etc) Reinforcement learning theory, and related applications Correspondence Email:	zhaop [at] lamda.nju.edu.cn or zhaopeng.gm [at] gmail.com Office:	Room 1017, Computer Science Building, Xianlin Campus of Nanjing University.
